entities.name: quidditch team
entities.description: The Quidditch team is being re-formed by Angelina, with permission from McGonagall and possibly Dumbledore.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall gave permission for the Quidditch team to be re-formed.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore may have appealed to Umbridge on behalf of the Quidditch team.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge was forced to give in and allow the Quidditch team to be re-formed.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is leading the effort to re-form the Quidditch team.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a member of the group trying to re-form the Quidditch team.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a member of the group trying to re-form the Quidditch team.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione seems distracted and concerned about something.

entities.name: peevs
entities.description: Peeves is causing trouble by throwing ink pellets.
